title: The Return to the Hollow (Part III)
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 1,210 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 620L, Fiction Series
description: In this exciting installment of the Hollow Kid series, Qynn and Sarah have finally discovered the original Porter's Mill. Will they discover clues about the whereabouts of Sarah's mom and Qynn's Uncle Jasper? Will they finally learn the source of the haunting laughter? Read The Return to the Hollow (Part III) to find out! While immersing themselves in this suspenseful adventure story, students will also practice sequencing events in a text and using contractions.
meta: abandoned, clenched, clods, exasperated, explore, frantically, multitude, nudges, ornate, passageway, pendant, sorrowful
Make, revise, and confirm predictions to understand text
Sequence Events : Sequence events in the text
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
